amendment.description: An amendment numbered 80 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prevent funds from this act to house aliens who are unlawfully present in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Malliotakis amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Malliotakis amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Malliotakis amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
